summary: Adds a new 2-h katana into skyrim. with a scabbard.
descriptionHtml:
Samurai swords are designed to be used with two hands.  I really hate that most western rpgs depict it as a 1-h sword.  Anyway this is a stand-alone version of a modified blade sword, now properly two-handed and carried on the back, including a scabbard.  So now you no longer have to use the ugly awkward 1-h carry position. See screenshots.

To get it you need be able to forge daedric weaponry.

Recipe: 2 steel, 2 refined moonstone, 1 leather strip.

Stats:
weight 12
base damage 21


Ver 2:
Retextured the blade, much cleaner look and without bo-hi (groove, i personally don\'t like bo-hi style). 

Changed the swing sound to a more light-weighted effect.

Sword is a tiny bit faster now.
author: Abakus
